description:
Beautifully Presented in English
★★ NEW: Game settings and state are saved ★★

Challenge yourself with this version of the Classic Chinese tile game Mahjongg solitaire.   Match pairs of tiles to clear the board.  Features include:

★ Multiple backgrounds
★ Four tile sets
★ 15 layouts
★ Hint feature
★ Game settings and state saved on exit

★★ Coming soon:  New layouts, sound, music & more ★★

Note: If you are unfamiliar with the rules of Mahjongg solitaire you may also match the four winds (North, South, East and West), the four seasons (Spring, Summer, Autumn and Winter) and the four flowers (Orchid, Mum, Bamboo and Plum). The currently selected tile is outlined in yellow. Hint tiles are outlined in blue.

★★ We welcome all feedback. Please visit the app's site for more information or e-mail us at lopan@dynaptic.com. NOTE: We do not control the App Catalog. If you have trouble downloading try again later or try using WiFi. ★★

New in this version:

★ Game settings saved when changed
★ Game state saved after moves
